title: All my friends are gone?
body: Logged on for the first time since the new season started and my friends list was had no one i recognised on it, All my OCE friends were gone and instead i had 5 #NA1 accounts. Whats the go with that?

replies.body:
Possible workaround for the empty friends list bug (for Win 10):

1. Press "Start"
2. Search "Date and Time"
3. Select "Date and Time Settings"
4. Activate "Set time automatically" and "Set time zone automatically"
5. Press "Sync now" under "Synchronise your clock"
6. Reload your client
Same, logged in today and half my friend-list were names I didn't recognize, random stuff.
